messages.custom_type: &eEnter in the chat the new custom type of this item
messages.wrong_color: &cUnknown color. It can either be its name (red, blue, etc..) or under 'RED, GREEN, BLUE' such as '255, 255, 255' for white.
messages.base64: &eEnter in the chat the Base64 value for this head. These value can be found on website like &6https://minecraft-heads.com/ &eor using &6Head Database&e.
messages.property_require_info: &cSome requirement are not here while changing this property:
messages.parsing_material: &eEnter, in the chat, the new material you want this item have.
messages.display_name: &eEnter in the chat the new custom name. (support color code)
messages.enter_item_id: &eEnter in the chat the new unique id of your item.
messages.parsing_lore: &eEnter in the chat the new line of the lore you want to add.
enter_color: &eEnter in the chat the new color of your potion.
&eYou can input two type of color:
&6→ &eUsing the color name (ex: red, blue, lime, orange)
messages.item_already_exist: &cAn item with that id already exist.
messages.rarity: &eEnter in the chat the new rarity of your item.
